datetime.description: The date and hour of the bike share count, in the format "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM"

count.description: The number of bike shares in the given hour

holiday.description: Indicates whether the day is a holiday (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The day is not a holiday

workingday.description: Indicates whether the day is a working day (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The day is not a working day
value_dict.1: The day is a working day

temp.description: The temperature at the given hour in Celsius

feels_like.description: What the temperature feels like at the given hour in Celsius

temp_min.description: The minimum temperature at the given hour in Celsius

temp_max.description: The maximum temperature at the given hour in Celsius

pressure.description: The atmospheric pressure at the given hour in hPa

humidity.description: The humidity level at the given hour, in percentage

wind_speed.description: The wind speed at the given hour in meter/sec

wind_deg.description: The wind direction at the given hour in meteorological degrees

rain_1h.description: The amount of rain that occurred in the last hour in mm

snow_1h.description: The amount of snow that occurred in the last hour in mm

clouds_all.description: The cloudiness at the given hour, in percentage

weather_main.description: The main weather condition at the given hour

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in bike sharing data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bike sharing dataset, please predict the number of bikes rented.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted number of rented bikes is.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather dataset, please predict the temperature.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather dataset, please predict the feels like temperature.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted feels like temperature is.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather dataset, please predict the humidity.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather dataset, please predict the wind speed.
